products.name: Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Power Edition Quadricopter (PF721005BI)
products.shortDescription: The Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Power Edition quadricopter is the perfect high-end toy for every enthusiast. Not only does it let you take flight like a pro with its solid construction and advanced features, but you can also control it with your smartphone or tablet and get as close to flying as possible as you view the earth from high above. Two HD batteries are included for even more flying time.

products.name: DJI Phantom 2 Vision Plus Quad-copter with Camera (DJI P2V+ V3.0) - White
products.shortDescription: Ever wondered what the world would look like if you could fly? Capture a bird's eye view of a nearby beach, park or hiking trail with the Phantom 2 Vision+ Version 3 quadcopter. Version 3 features upgraded props, motors, ESCs, and remote for more thrust and better control. The flying camera records HD video and streams live to your smartphone.

products.name: Zoomer Boomer Robot Dinosaur
products.shortDescription: Meet Boomer, the ferocious but cuddly Zoomer Dino! Take home your very own Jurassic friend with this tame robot dinosaur. Featuring interactive abilities, this zooming dino can spin, chomp, and roar as he roams around your home. Boomer can be cute and friendly, but watch out for his chompers, especially when you pull his tail!

products.name: Viper 18" Bristle Dart Board
products.shortDescription: It's the perfect addition to your games room. The Viper League Pro is self-healing, sisal fibre dartboard  and accommodates both steel and soft tip darts. Round-shaped wires and a staple-free bull's eye help prevent bounce offs. It comes with a cricket scoreboard with chalk and eraser, one set of steel tip darts, game manual, and mounting hardware.

products.name: Sphero Ollie App-Controlled Robot (1B01FCA) - White
products.shortDescription: Upgrade your play with Ollie, the app-controlled robot that pairs instantly to your smart device via Bluetooth LE and is powered by USB charging.  Engineered for speed and programmed for tricks, every movement Ollie makes is customized by you. You can even add custom tires and hubcaps to make things more interesting.

products.name: Parrot Rolling Spider Mini-Drone (PRO-PF723001) - Blue
products.shortDescription: The ultra-light Parrot Rolling Spider combines speed and stability for a smooth, exciting flight. Thanks to impressive agility and cutout propellers this compact drone can be flown both indoors and outdoors. It features top speeds of 18km/h, a free-fall start and a mini camera so you can experience a unique POV flying experience.

products.name: Zoomer 2.0 Dalmatian Robot Dog
products.shortDescription: Adopt your new dog, Zoomer, and experience the joys of owning a dog. He'll perform tricks, come when you call him, and will always be up for a belly scratch. Zoomer's so smart he'll respond to English, Spanish, and French and will follow you with his expressive eyes. He'll play, bark, and roll over just like a real dog!

products.name: Parrot Jumping Sumo Mini-Drone (PRO-PF724001) - Black
products.shortDescription: The Parrot Jumping Sumo is a responsive rover with a lot of personality. Roll, zig-zag, circle, push and jump with precise fingertip controls. It features customizable sounds and an embedded camera that puts you in the centre of the action.

products.name: Gio 120.5 cm 6 Speed Electric All Terrain Bike (H1-Volt-Orange) - Orange
products.shortDescription: Cruise along in avant-garde style on the GIO H1 Volt electric mountain bike. Equipped with a 350W motor, this bike can give you a power boost whether you're rushing to work or riding through the woods. With varying levels of assistance and the option to turn off the motor, this bike lets you choose how much of a workout you want.

products.name: Parrot Rolling Spider Mini-Drone (PRO-PF723002) - Red
products.shortDescription: The ultra-light Parrot Rolling Spider combines speed and stability for a smooth, exciting flight. Thanks to impressive agility and cutout propellers this compact drone can be flown both indoors and outdoors. It features top speeds of 18km/h, a free-fall start and a mini camera so you can experience a unique POV flying experience.

products.name: Sphero 2.0 Robotic Ball Toy
products.shortDescription: The Sphero 2.0 is brighter, faster, and smarter than its predecessor. Choose from over 25 apps for this robotic gaming system and open up a whole new world of fun. Augmented reality turns your environment into a video game with endless ways to play.

products.name: Traxxas E-Revo 4WD 1/10 Scale RC Truck - (56087-1) - Silver
products.shortDescription: Tough, durable, and powerful, the Traxxas E-Revo Brushless Edition RC monster truck is equipped to fulfill your need for speed. With a waterproof MXL-6s brushless power system and Talon tires, it's more than prepared to thrive in all types of weather and tackle any kind of terrain with a brutality that will leave the competition in the dust.

products.name: Zoomer Zuppies Dalmatian Robot Dog
products.shortDescription: Take care of your own designer pup with a Zuppie! Their large, expressive puppy eyes lets you know if they're happy or sad. Tickle their tummy and watch their personality grow the more you play with them. The articulated legs, and LED eyes allow them to play games, share secrets, and be the best friend you've always wanted.

products.name: Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Elite Edition Quadricopter (PF721800)
products.shortDescription: Now you can fly the friendly skies just by using your smartphone. The Parrot AR drone 2.0. quadrocopter is completely controlled by your Android or iOS device thanks to the free AR.Freeflight application. Whether you're indoors or outdoors, you can fly the copter fast or slow, high or low, and even pull some crazy stunts that can be recorded or streamed from the built-in HD camera.

products.name: Protocol Dronium RC QuadCopter (6182-4B BI) - Grey
products.shortDescription: Take your hobbies to new heights. This Protocol Dronium QuadCopter takes to the skies, driven by a powerful and easy-to-use system that enables both directional movement and special functions like continuous rolling, so you can create your very own air show anytime. Equipped with an HD camera, you can record flights up to 30 minutes long.

products.name: Zoomer Zuppies Candy Robot Dog - Pink
products.shortDescription: You won't be able to resist the puppy eyes of Candy, the sweet and realistic Zuppie! Interact with her and she'll respond to your touch by letting you know how she's feeling. Small enough to take around, but a perfect size for cuddling, Candy will become your new best friend as soon as you bring her home.

products.name: Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Quadricopter (PF721002AA) - Blue
products.shortDescription: The Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 quadricopter is the perfect high-end toy for every enthusiast. Not only does it let you take flight like a pro with its solid construction and advanced features, but you can also control it with your smartphone or tablet and get as close to flying as possible as you view the earth from high above.

products.name: Zoomer 2.0 Shadow Robot Dog
products.shortDescription: Adopt your new dog, Shadow, and experience the joys of owning a dog. He'll perform tricks, come when you call him, and will always be up for a belly scratch. Shadow's so smart he'll respond to English, Spanish, and French and will follow you with his expressive eyes. He'll play, bark, and roll over just like a real dog!

products.name: WowWee MiP 2 Balancing Robot (0825) - Black / Silver
products.shortDescription: The perfect companion for gadget enthusiasts and allergy-plagued pet lovers alike, the WowWee MiP Robot offers fun and intuitive interaction controlled by your smartphone and GestureSense technology.  MiP plays games, dances, battles, balances and more - with an immersive personality and impressive response time, you'll be a MiPster at first swipe.

products.name: WowWee MiP 2 Balancing Robot (0821) - White / Black
products.shortDescription: The perfect companion for gadget enthusiasts and allergy-plagued pet lovers alike, the WowWee MiP Robot offers fun and intuitive interaction controlled by your smartphone and GestureSense technology.  MiP plays games, dances, battles, balances and more - with an immersive personality and impressive response time, you'll be a MiPster at first swipe.

products.name: Parrot Rolling Spider Mini-Drone (PRO-PF723000) - White
products.shortDescription: The ultra-light Parrot Rolling Spider combines speed and stability for a smooth, exciting flight. Thanks to impressive agility and cutout propellers this compact drone can be flown both indoors and outdoors. It features top speeds of 18km/h, a free-fall start and a mini camera so you can experience a unique POV flying experience.

products.name: Franklin Bristle Dartboard Set (PRE-FRK-3562)
products.shortDescription: Indulge in friendly competition with this Bristol 18-inch dartboard from Franklin Sports. With its clean wood finish and laminated wood cabinet, it makes a great addition to your games room. The dartboard comes with six steel-tipped darts and a chalk chart board on the cabinet for keeping track of scores.

products.name: Protocol Ferrari 458 1/14 Scale RC Car (6182-3U BI) - Red/White
products.shortDescription: Realize your dream of driving a Ferrari 458 with this remote control car. This sturdy, hard-wearing vehicle is equipped to tackle the ground terrain, letting you experience the fun of operating a luxury car at a mere fraction of the expense.

products.name: Protocol Stealth Hawk Camouflage 12.6" RC Helicopter (7858-3BC BI)
products.shortDescription: Conquer the skies with the Protocol StealthHawk RC Helicopter with Gyro. The built in gyroscopic stabilizer offers more precise omni-directional flight and control. The co-axial auto-stabilizing rotor system delivers pinpoint accuracy and responsiveness so you can easily maneuver in all directions and even hover - just like a real helicopter.

products.name: Zoomer 2.0 Bentley Robot Dog
products.shortDescription: Adopt your new dog, Bentley, and experience the joys of owning a dog. He'll perform tricks, come when you call him, and will always be up for a belly scratch. Bentley's so smart he'll respond to English, Spanish, and French and will follow you with his expressive eyes. He'll play, bark, and roll over just like a real dog!

products.name: LeapFrog LeapPad3 Learning Tablet - Green - English
products.shortDescription: With LeapSearch powered by Zui, this LeapFrog LeapPad3 31500 tablet provides age-appropriate videos, games and other Web-based content for your little one to safely enjoy. The 5" capacitive touch screen lets your child navigate with ease.

products.name: LaTrax Teton Waterproof 4WD 1/8 Scale RC Truck (76054) - Blue
products.shortDescription: Revel in the speed and performance of the LaTrax 76054 1/18 Teton 4WD monster truck. It's a powerful 4-wheel drive off-roader that's quick and versatile for radio-controlled fun anytime, anywhere. The steep approach angle lets the grippy tires attack large rocks and tall curbs with aggressive climbing action.

products.name: Traxxas Stampede 4WD 1/10 Scale RC Monster Truck - Black
products.shortDescription: Experience sensational wheelie-popping fun with the Traxxas Stampede monster truck. It achieves top speeds of over 30 mph thanks to the Titan 12-Turn modified 550 motor, waterproof XL-5 Electronic Speed Control, and included 7-cell Power Cell iD battery pack. Race just about anywhere with this ultra-durable, waterproof RC truck.

products.name: Litehawk II Helicopter (31336)
products.shortDescription: Built with the latest technology, including a 3D Gyro stabilizer, this mini helicopter is easy enough even for beginners to fly.  Capable of incredible multi-directional flight, it can fly up, down, forward and backward, and it can complete right and left turns as well as complete revolutions with optimum accuracy.

products.name: Protocol 24" Heli-Raider RC Helicopter (7858-3JNHR BI) - Blue
products.shortDescription: Protocol's Heli-Raider with Gyro RC Helicopter blasts through the height and control limits that normally come with remote controlled flight. The Heli-Raider's gyro action provides precision flight and stability in turns thanks to its wide wingspan.  Bright flashing LED lights and sleek, aerodynamic design elements complete the stellar package.

products.name: Parrot Jumping Sumo Mini-Drone (PRO-PF724000) - White
products.shortDescription: The Parrot Jumping Sumo is a responsive rover with a lot of personality. Roll, zig-zag, circle, push and jump with precise fingertip controls. It features customizable sounds and an embedded camera that puts you in the centre of the action.

products.name: Traxxas E-Revo VXL 1/16 Scale RC Car - Black/Silver
products.shortDescription: It's power and performance in a small package. The Traxxas 1/16 E-Revo has a Titan 12-turn 550 motor with an integrated cooling fan, delivering speeds up to 32km/h. The XL-2.5 electronic speed control offers high current handling, EZ-Set one-button setup, and smooth high-frequency control, for incredible torque for exciting all-terrain adventures.
